definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department

sentences.english: His paintings and postcards are always thought-provoking and at the same time quite funny to look at.
sentences.chinese: 他的圖畫和卡片在發人深省的同時看着還相當的有趣。

sentences.english: This is one of the most sobering truths about being a parent.
sentences.chinese: 這是作爲父母，最發人深省的真理之一。

sentences.english: The annotation to common sensation was more than penetrating, which set people thinking.
sentences.chinese: 平實的感情詮釋，卻也入木三分，發人深省。

sentences.english: A peak inside these factory farms would give you food for thought.
sentences.chinese: 對這些工廠化農場內部的一瞥會發人深省。
我發現這個故事發人深省。

sentences.english: But we hope they are all thought-provoking.
sentences.chinese: 然而我們希望他們全部都能發人深省。

sentences.english: The effect is impressionistic and stunning.
sentences.chinese: 效果令人印象深刻，發人深省。

sentences.english: This is a very thought-provoking picture.
sentences.chinese: 這是一張非常發人深省的圖片。
讀一點發人深省的東西。

definition: thought-provoking/worth thinking over/to provide food for thought
variant of 圖像|图像[tu2 xiang4]
universally shocking/to offend the whole of society
to have a unique style of one's own (idiom)
handling a butcher's cleaver with ease (idiom); to do sth skillfully and easily
